newsitem.title: GERMANY: Buba sets next two repos at unchanged 3.0 pct rate.
newsitem.headline: Buba sets next two repos at unchanged 3.0 pct rate.

text.p: The Bundesbank said on Thursday its next two securities repurchase tenders would be set at an unchanged interest rate of 3.0 percent.
The securities repurchase rate has been steady at three percent since August last year.

The central bank will not hold a policy meeting for the next four weeks and in the past it has often set tenders in advance to cover the whole of a period in which no meetings are scheduled. However, the bank does not need its full policy council to set repos, which are the responsibility of the Frankfurt directorate. --Frankfurt Newsroom +49 69 756525
